member.name: IMFMediaSinkPreroll.NotifyPreroll
member.summary: Notifies the media sink that the presentation clock is about to start.
member.param: The upcoming start time for the presentation clock, in 100-nanosecond units. This time is the same value that will be given to the method when the presentation clock is started.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Enables a media sink to receive samples before the presentation clock is started.
To get a pointer to this interface, call QueryInterface on the media sink.
